XIII.i.3.E.1.b
.
Policy on Chemotherapy Treatments
Chemotherapy prescribed for personnel testing positive for tuberculin reaction is to be continued over a 12-month period to reduce the possibility of subsequently acquiring tuberculosis.
Important
:  A positive tuberculin reaction without any other evidence of a tuberculosis infection is
not
a disease or disability and is
not
a reason for discharge from service.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E - Medical Treatment for Veterans Showing a Positive Tuberculin Reaction
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E
